doc:
Rhoda Gemignani https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhoda_Gemignani 0 Rhoda Gemignani (born October 21, 1940, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) is an American actress, best known for her recurring role as Mrs. Rossini in the American television sitcom Who's the Boss?. She also played in other sitcoms, including The Bob Newhart Show, The Jeffersons, Just Shoot Me! as Elliot's mother, The Twilight Zone, Family Album (as Ruby DeMattis), Friends, Seinfeld, Full House, Kojak, The Mary Tyler Moore Show, NBC Special Treat, Walker, Texas Ranger and many others. She also played in the films Ghostbusters (1984), Carlo's Wake (1999), and The Man Who Wasn't There (2001). Rhoda_Gemignani ( born October_21_,_1940 , in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_recurring_role as Mrs._Rossini in the_American_television_sitcom Who 's the_Boss ? . She also played in other_sitcoms , including The_Bob_Newhart_Show , The_Jeffersons , Just Shoot Me ! as Elliot 's_mother , The_Twilight_Zone , Family_Album_( as Ruby_DeMattis_) , Friends , Seinfeld , Full_House , Kojak , The_Mary_Tyler_Moore_Show , NBC_Special_Treat , Walker , Texas_Ranger and many_others . She also played in the_films_Ghostbusters ( 1984_) , Carlo 's_Wake_(_1999_) , and The_Man Who Was n't There ( 2001_) .
